data.eml:eml: A revision of the genus Ora Clark, 1865 (Coleoptera: Scirtidae) in Argentina (part II) — redescriptions, updated distributions and a key to species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Libonatti, María Laura (2015): A revision of the genus Ora Clark, 1865 (Coleoptera: Scirtidae) in Argentina (part II) — redescriptions, updated distributions and a key to species. Zootaxa 3985 (1): 69-97, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3985.1.4
